name: lib/has.js
has
description: Determines if `object` has the given key(s).

params.name: key
params.description: Could be everything: String, an array of strings, or a function that returns a boolean.

name: lib/index.js
content:
import merge from './merge'
import only from './only'
import has from './has'
import parsePath from './parsePath'

export default { merge, only, has, parsePath }

name: lib/merge.js
merge
description: Merges given objects with no recursion.

name: lib/mergeAll.js
lib/only.js
only
description: Gives you only the wanted keys.

name: lib/parsePath.js
parsePath
description: Parses the path to an array.

content:
# XOBJ: extreme methods for objects âœ¨
A tiny and delightful library for manipulating objects with it's own strong prototype.
> **IMPORTANT NOTICE**: I'm working on v2 with a different API, The current API (v1.1) will become deprecated. The old API is available on branch `v1`.
## Installation
**v2 is not published yet**, but it'll be available as `@hkh12/xobj`.
```sh
npm install @hkh12/xobj
```
## Docs
For a full documentation, visit [here](docs/README.md).
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "@hkh12/xobj",
  "version": "1.1.0",
  "description": "extreme methods for objects",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "rollup -c",
    "start": "rollup -cw",
    "prepublish": "npm run build",
    "pretest": "npm run build",
    "test": "jest",
    "makedocs": "esdoc"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/Hkh12/xobj.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "object",
    "obj",
    "utility",
    "util",
    "utils",
    "utility-library"
  ],
  "author": "Hosein Khansari <hrk.x11@gmail.com>",
  "license": "GPL-3.0",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/Hkh12/xobj/issues"
  },
  "main": "dist/xobj.common.js",
  "browser": "dist/xobj.browser.js",
  "module": "dist/xobj.esm.js",
  "homepage": "https://github.com/Hkh12/xobj#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-plugin-external-helpers": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-publish-markdown-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jest": "^23.4.0",
    "rollup": "^0.62.0",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^3.0.7",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^9.1.3",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^3.3.0",
    "rollup-plugin-uglify": "^4.0.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.3"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist"
  ],
  "jest": {
    "testRegex": "/test/.*.js$"
  }
}
name: package.json
